title: THE COUNCIL DRAFT GAME — HUMAN RULEBOOK (V2)
description: A refined rulebook for the Council Draft negotiation game, clarifying the AI’s role as alien adjudicator, formalizing goals and victory conditions, and introducing modular modes of play to support different groups while keeping the game’s ethical and philosophical core intact.
author: Aleksandr

fieldDefinitions.phase: The Bloom phase expressing the symbolic and psychological state in which the work was created.
fieldDefinitions.timeFelt: The moment or period during which the phase was lived or embodied.
fieldDefinitions.motifMap: Key symbolic elements and their meanings as they appear within the work.
fieldDefinitions.associatedMedia: Images or media connected to the piece, if any.
fieldDefinitions.generatedBy: The system and date used to generate this metadata.

motifMap.meaning: A non-human epistemology judging Earth’s council by value, leverage, and coherence
Modular lenses that change how identity, information, and performance affect the evaluation
A composite of archetypes drafted under constraint, revealing values through synergy

associatedMedia.description: Text-based Substack rulebook post; no associated images.
